Insurance Co. Limited-
Group Personal Accident
– Endorsements		Disablement:
Weekly
compensation of
1% of Sum Insured,
subject to a
maximum of
₹10,000 per week
for up to 104
weeks. Limited to
25% of gross
monthly earnings.

Medical Expenses
Extension:
Reimbursement of
medical expenses
up to 40% of
admissible claim or
20% of Sum
Insured, whichever
is lower.
Covers
ambulance/medical
evacuation
expenses up to
₹1,500 per claim on
submission of
proof.

Child Education:
₹10,000 per child,
subject to a
maximum of two
children, payable in
case of death of the
insured under
Benefit-1.
